-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("TimeHelper", function (namespace)
    local epoch, ClientNow, ClientNowSeconds, Now, static
    static = function (this)
      epoch = System.DateTime(1970, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, System.DateTimeKind.Utc):getTicks()
    end
    -- <summary>
    -- 客户端时间
    -- </summary>
    ClientNow = function ()
      return System.div((System.DateTime.getUtcNow():getTicks() - epoch), 10000)
    end
    ClientNowSeconds = function ()
      return System.div((System.DateTime.getUtcNow():getTicks() - epoch), 10000000)
    end
    Now = function ()
      return ClientNow()
    end
    return {
      ClientNow = ClientNow,
      ClientNowSeconds = ClientNowSeconds,
      Now = Now,
      static = static
    }
  end)
end)
